thread.section_title: Personal Comfort Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personal Comfort | personalcomfortbed.com
thread.title: Beth Miller
thread.title_full: Personal Comfort reviewed by Beth Miller

author: Beth Miller
title: Beth Miller
text:
I love the bed now that I have all the parts I didn't realize the foundation had to be ordered separately. Someone should have told me that !!
Also wasn't told, suggested, that an extra inch of foam under the mattress cover would be helpful. Had to wait for that also
The free shipping isn't worth the wait.
